import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Outlet, Route, Routes, useLocation, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { deleteFunc, setAll } from '../../Features/Slice' import Footer from '../Footer/Footer' import { SideBar } from '../Sidebar/SideBar' import Dashboard from './Pages/Dashboard' import AddProduct from './Pages/AddProduct' import DataTables from './Pages/DataTables' import ListProducts from './Pages/ListProducts' import { dataHubType } from '../../Types/types' import LoginSignup from '../../AuthComponents/LoginSignup' const Body = () => { const dataHub:dataHubType=useSelector((state:dataHubType)=>state) const dispatch=useDispatch() const location = useLocation(); // if(dataHub.session=="") // navigate('/auth') console.log('state => ',dataHub) console.log("path",location) return ( <>

{(location.pathname=='/')?'Dashboard':location.pathname.replaceAll('_',' ').slice(1)}

Home {(location.pathname=='/')?'/ Dashboard':location.pathname.replace("/", " / ")}

) } export default Body
